content: I don't have a definite answer to this question. however, given u2's history, it seems likely that they will continue to collaborate with other musicians in the future. collaboration has been an important part of u2's sound and evolution as a band, and they have worked with a wide range of artists from different genres and backgrounds over the years. as u2 looks to continue their musical legacy and push themselves creatively, it seems probable that they will continue to seek out new collaborators and experiment with new sounds and styles.
